item.Q:
Write the character: gòng
(gòngtóng de gòng)
item.A:
common; general; to share; together; total; altogether
共同 gòngtóng common; joint; jointly; together; collaborative
fēnzhī branch (of company, river etc)
dìzhī earthly branches
zhīchū (v) spend; pay out; (n) expense
zhīchí to be in favor of; to support; to back; support; backing; to stand by

traditional: 支書
zhīshū party branch secretary

traditional: 支氣管

traditional: 支隊
zhīduì supporting unit

traditional: 開支
kāizhī expenditures; pay; expenses

traditional: 不獨
bùdú not only

traditional: 單獨

traditional: 獨一無二
dúyīwúèr (set phrase) (adj) unique; unrivalled; unmatached

traditional: 獨到

traditional: 獨子

traditional: 獨特

yígòng altogether
